ygData.subject: Re: Is torca after power or is it something else
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it just me, or is everyone misunderstanding Torca?  Have you even read my tech specs?  Well, here thy are: A direct descendent of the great Optimus Prime,

Subject: Re: Is torca after power or is it something else
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Is it just me, or is everyone misunderstanding Torca?  Have you even read my 
tech specs?  Well, here thy are:

A direct descendent of the great Optimus Prime, he and Liono are good 
friends. He tends to act a bit more warlike and a bit less democratic than 
the great leader of old. Feels a burden trying to live up to the legend of 
his ancestor. Idolizes current Autobot Leader Fire Convoy.

So you see?  I'm just trying to be a good warrior, I ain't trying to 
overthrow you.  I wish you would listen and tell me something that I should 
do in this battle, old friend.(And I mean it Torca and you go way back)
